recipe.name: Cinnamon Sticks
recipe.notes: Found on the back of a Tillamook butter package, this looks suspiciously similar to other butter package cinamon-stick recipes.  But, if it is indeed that common, how bad can it be?
recipe.preparation: Mix all dry ingredients and cut in butter to form ball.  Chill 5 minutes and roll out to 1/2".  Cut into strips 2"x1/2".  Space 1" apart on baking sheets and cook at 350F for 8-10 minutes or until brown.Allow to cool for five minutes then roll in topping mixture.
recipe.source_name: Tilamook Butter Package -- Credited to Jan Marti, Tillamook Dairy Farmer
